column5: Our place is close to Dripping Springs, Wimberley and Blanco, TX. An hour from Austin and San Antonio. We are located on 10 acres in the beautiful Hill Country situated on a hill with a view. Enjoy walks on the nature paths, archery, ladder golf and washers. There is a small smoker for grilling your meal. Other activities nearby include the Blanco and Pedernales Falls State Parks, wineries, breweries and mom and pop eateries. We also offer canoe rentals including taking and picking up!
